features: 6-INCH-SCALE COLLECTIBLE SPIDER-VERSE FIGURE: The Spot arrives at Marvel Legends with this premium 6-inch-scale action figure inspired by Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Part One)!
INSPIRED BY SPIDER-MAN: ACROSS THE SPIDER-VERSE: This Marvel Legends The Spot figure features deco inspired by his appearance in the movie!
PREMIUM DETAILING AND ARTICULATION: The Marvel Legends Series The Spot figure is highly posable for display and play and features sculpt and deco inspired by the distinct Spider-Verse visual style!

OUT POPPED A SPIDER: This Marvel Legends The Spot figure features unique stand and portal accessories that allow fans and collectors to simulate Miles Morales poking his head and hand out of the the Spot’s portals!
MARVEL UNIVERSE IN 6-INCH SCALE: Look for other Hasbro Marvel Legends Series figures inspired by Marvel Entertainment (Additional figures each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: If The Spot can realize the power of his abilities, he could become a threat to the entire universe. With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. From figures to vehicles to premium roleplay items, the Marvel Legends Series offers elite character-inspired product for Marvel fans and collectors. Additional figures each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2022 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience Marvel Legends! For 20 years, the Marvel Legends series has brought the iconic characters and stories of Marvel to life for fans and collectors around the world with premium action figures drawn from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with figures from the Marvel Legends Series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He is so babygirl tbh,,,
reviews.reviewText: He’s extremely well articulated for only being around 6 inches, I think he has 16 points of articulation with is crazy tbh. The sculpt is amazing as well, there’s a surprising amount of detail for how little detail he has in the movie, he comes with two sets of hands, the default ones have their own unique sculpt, instead of just the same one mirrored, and the other set has the same sculpt, but their fists so it makes sense. Paint job is good, though I assume most of him is unpainted since he is mostly just white. The paint job on the miles bits that come with him are great as well, the lines on his face mask are crisp, while the palms of his hands look airbrushed just like the movie, he also even has that carbon fiber suit texture. There was a lot of detail put into this, even the accessories are super detailed. I see no flaws in this and I would definitely recommend. Totally worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars such a good figure
reviews.reviewText: i have SO MUCH fun with this figure. he's become such a little companion that i have to bring with me around my apartment now. the quality is honestly amazing, i was surprised this set turned out so accurate and so well made?? the posing is very flexible, i keep finding new ways to bend the joints for even goofier poses. i havent had this much fun with a figure in a long time!! i love him very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars babygirl looking silly as always
reviews.reviewText: i got this for my close friend's birthday (on friday) and this is their favorite character from atsv so like what other choice but this dude amirite i mean he's so babygirl actually?? Anyhoo awesome condition looking very polished and nice!!!! happy to get this and i may even get one for myself... but to be honest i'd more likely buy it again if it wasn't like over 20$ or so, especially considering the size of the figure itself

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty nice figure with a couple flaws
reviews.reviewText: like the title says. as with other marvel legends figures his joints are a little stiff, but nothing a little heat can’t fix. since his joints are stiff and his limbs are thin they do feel brittle when you move them but ultimately they’re fine once you loosen them. he’s somewhat hard to balance and i wish he came with his own stand so you could make more poses with him. the miles accessories are definitely a fun addition! this is just a nitpick, but i wish he came with 2 relaxed hands and 2 w/ splayed fingers instead of the 1 relaxed and 1 splayed, just for more pose possibilities. overall he feels sturdy, is very fun to pose, and is super movie accurate:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Silliness? 10/10Pose-ability? 9/10Photogenicess? 10/10Holes? 10/10I was so hesitant on spending over $20 on this guy, but in so glad I caved. He's just so much fun to take photos of because of the amount of joints and movement range!! I feel like yes they could have given him more hand options probably, but I really enjoy this figure and can't help but take him to every scenic place I go to for some cute pictures. Definitely recommend to any Spot enjoyer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This guy looks just like in the movie, my kids loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels a bit "tiny"
reviews.reviewText: Marvel Legends toys are almost always a cut above the rest. This one is no different, but compared solely to other Marvel Legends, the limbs are very thin and the sculpt is odd - though accurate to the film. The joints feel like they "could" become weaker with repeated play, but haven't so far. All in all, it's a good version of The Spot. I just with they'd made it a little more sturdy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I forgot to write a review for this a few months ago but this figure has become my pride and joy. I always bring him to hangouts and family functions and he’s so silly to carry around and pose and play with. My friends agree that he is the silliest creature on earth! I recommend this if you or someone you know has a special place for spot in their heart. ❤️
De muy buena calidad y con buenos detalles, quedó conforme mi hijo, recomendable.
Habe die Figur verschenkt. Kam sehr gut an.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For my sons collection, great, flexible character
Acheté pour mon petit-fils qui l'adore !
Ottima figure per esposizione con molte articolazioni
